summary: Frontend-only testing of DDW Agency website with 10 pages (4 service, 4 industry, Portfolio, Labs). All features working correctly. New Portfolio and Labs pages implemented with proper content including country flags and SaaS product listings.

issues: Minor z-index/overlap issue when mobile menu opens over hero slider content - menu content renders but hero content shows through slightly. Not critical - menu items are still readable and functional.
